explains: v. 取代；（用……）替换，（以……）接替；更换， 赔还；把......放回原处
wordGroup: replace with 替换为；以…代替

sentences.en: Have they found anyone to replace her yet?
sentences.cn: 他们找到了代替她的人没有？

sentences.en: He headed off efforts to replace him as leader.
sentences.cn: 他挫败了要取代他的领导地位的企图。

sentences.en: New laws will soon replace existing legislation.
sentences.cn: 新法律即将取代现行法规。
